segments.text: Hi , Sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , there . I'd like to know about Clean Collection . My company in the US is going to send me a cheque . It's for my wages , but I'm not too sure about how to cash it here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . If the cheque is coming from the US , into a local currency account it will take 7 working days to clear .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there any way we can speed it up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is , actually . If you can get your company to apply for a cheque from a bank in Shanghai , that'll speed things up no end .
segments.speaker: S1
